text: The Range Boss is a 1917 silent film western directed by W. S. Van Dyke and starring Jack Gardner. It was produced by the Essanay Film Company and released through K-E-S-E.The Range Boss at silentera.comThe AFI Catalog of Feature Films 1893-1993:The Range Boss ==Cast== *Jack Gardner - Rex Randerson *Ruth King - Ruth Harkness *Carl Stockdale - Willard Masten ==Preservation status== * A print is preserved in the George Eastman House, Rochester. ==References== ==External links== * The Range Boss at IMDb.com * * lantern slide Category:1917 films Category:American silent feature films Category:American black-and-white films Category:Films directed by W. S. Van Dyke Category:Essanay Studios films Category:American films Category:American Western (genre) films Category:1917 Western (genre) films
title: The Range Boss
